game.name: Wallpaper Engine
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Photo Editing, Utilities
game.categories: Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Workshop, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: 바탕화면에서 멋진 라이브 배경화면을 사용하세요. 자신의 이미지를 애니메이션으로 만들어서 새 배경화면을 생성하거나 비디오/웹 사이트를 가져와서 Steam Workshop에서 공유하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Use stunning live wallpapers on your desktop. Animate your own images to create new wallpapers or import videos/websites and share them on the Steam Workshop!
